name: Vera Lankov Simulator
description:
So I played the Lancer TTRPG with some friends, and was incredibly hyped to draw my newly acquired Tortuga mech. Then I realized I cannot draw, so I made a game instead. 

This started out as a little gamefeel prototype, then I started making a system damage mechanic for some reason, and now it's... this. I might develop it a little further in the future.

Controls

Escape quits the game, the other controls are explained in-game.
